tweet: Just reading the excellent white paper about #IOTA's #UIP bringing #SSI (self-sovereign identity) & #IDoT (identity of things) including #GDPR compliance (!!)   The excellent paper stays on a thorough conceptual accessible to all interested. Geeks go  https://t.co/7N4c96bj1S

Indeed! Thinking of #IOTA just as a #token or #cryptoasset you can speculate on does disservice to the much more ambitious goal of creating a #device-centric #M2M and #M2A #layer for the future #IoT. This will be the (logical, not HW-based) #infrastructure for many #ecosystems.

What about #IOTA's, i.e. #Qubic's way of decentralizing #oracles?  Evidently, making Qubic really work is, indeed, hard intellectual work, much of it still to be completed, but the methods do seem sound and capable to me to really deliver this.
